website_summaries.verdict: A quality flute that eliminates many of the pitfalls that discourage young players from continuing.
pros: Drawn and curled tone holes and covered keys
Nickel silver headjoint, body, and footjoint
Comes with case, polishing cloth, polish gauze, cleaning rod, and owner's manual
cons: May arrive with sticky pads, but this can be easily fixed

customer_reviews.title: This is after market junk. Not real Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: So I contacted Yamaha and gave them serial number and it wouldn't come up. They said then it's not their flute if nothing is coming up. It goes out of tune within minutes if playing. Don't waste your time and money if u are looking for professional flute
customer_reviews.author: Pavlo

customer_reviews.title: She told me it should be a genuine one and actually it sounds very good too! So very happy with my purchase and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if it is genuine or if it is fake as the price is much lower than the US version and its bag and box looks different than the US version and people had mentioned that they have bought lots of fake Yamaha flutes on Ebay. But I ordered and have it tested by a flute teacher. She told me it should be a genuine one and actually it sounds very good too! So very happy with my purchase and I recommend ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: alim

customer_reviews.title: Good for student
customer_reviews.text: It is good for a great brand as Yamaha. This is my first one. I have orderred a cheap flute but the quality was not as good like this yamaha flute. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, excellent tone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, excellent tone. Makes the last three flutes I owned look bad! I've played for 45 years.. this is a really great silver flute!
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: This is a great flute.
customer_reviews.text: So, so, much better than the thrice overhauled Emerson I have been playing. A very bright tone, very well constructed, plays well. Comes with a hard case, cleaning rod and cloth, owners manual. I would certainly buy it again. Official Yamaha dealers want almost twice as much for the same flute. The only thing you would be getting for your extra money is a longer warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade, great price
customer_reviews.text: great flute at a great price, my daughter uses it for marching band and her mates wish they had her flute (most have the 221)...considering the price, it's definitely a win
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Treto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flute, don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot express how happy I am with this new flute! I got it today and it made my old flute sound like garbage! The sound is superb and it is so much easier to play than my old flute! it came well packaged in a hard case. The flute is awesome, it plays the notes sweetly! Great quality instrument, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Peta_b

customer_reviews.title: Decide to return again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered YFL-222 Twice for my daughter’s school using. First one charged me $468.95. My daughter said one sound doesn’t right , I returned it and reordered. Second one charged me $508.81. Ordered same YFL-222, why the two flutes look different?why price also different? The first one look like same with pictures on Amazon web site. The second one looks cheaper than first one. The Yamaha Logo came out from bag.A lot glue on the bag. Shows MADE IN JAPAN on the flute. Question about this
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flute for my son. He loaned one from school which is the same model but had to return it since the school ended. By outlook, packaging, and parts, they are in brand new and sparkling condition. In terms of sound, it did sound a little bit different in the beginning. But according to the flute teacher, every flute is a little different and take some time to adapt to new one. After spending some time, the flute sounds as good as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Just because this is not from an American authorized Yamaha dealer doesn’t mean this us not a Yamaha flute. Do your research and weigh the pros and cons of purchasing instruments this way. This is a beautiful Yamaha flute with serial number. Made in Indonesia (my daughters student Yamaha flute that was from an authorized dealer was also made in Indonesia). Plays beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Connie H

customer_reviews.title: Great flute but has a couple of problems
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this flute as a replacement for my old flute for marching band. It worked great but alas over time it started to get harder and harder to tune not just outside but inside. Two times this year, at practice this flute literally came apart, the keys separated from the flute. Luckily at both practices we had a very nice teacher who fixed it for me, what would happen if that happened at a game! Anyways I can’t complain it brought me this far and still running strong for the first year using it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for intermediate players
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been playing for years and this flute is perfect for intermediate players. It has held up well and the sound is good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says the flute is great. We had previously purchased a couple of cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says the flute is great. We had previously purchased a couple of cheaper flutes as she was just learning how to play. In both cases while they were serviceable they eventually ended up with mechanical problems and had issues with playing the high notes. This one has given us no problems whatsoever and the sound quality is excellent. Haven't had it that long yet, however, so will be back here if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hsubox

customer_reviews.title: Easy mellow sound - easy to play Flute for beginners to intermediate
customer_reviews.text: Easy on the embouchure and the keys/pads well made. Easy to get back into the swing of practice/playing after many years not picking up a flute. Easy to hold and manipulate with small hands. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work after warranty(less than 3 months) expired.
customer_reviews.text: Strongly not suggest it: suddenly doesn't work, everyparts look fine, but don't know where the air leaks. It totally sucks. Don't deserve it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin An

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this flute for my daughter for use in her school band and she only played it three times and it has already started rusting/corroding on the inside! She has been playing flute for 6 years now and after very session she makes sure to properly clean and store her flute. This flute was pretty disappointing with how fast corrosion is forming. I would like a replacement flute. I would need a new flute sent to me first so she can continue playing in school. Once the new flute arrives, I will send the corroded one back. Your speedy response to this request would be most appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It’s easier than anything
customer_reviews.text: This flute, though expensive, is worth every penny. I had bought a cheaper flute in the past, and there were a lot of leaks and rusting. This one however is in great quality and has no leaks whatsoever. I find it better/easier to play, although that might just be me. Therefore I highly recommend this product for beginners in band.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: The flute is not operational after just a couple of months of use. Yamaha says it's not even an authentic Yamaha flute
customer_reviews.author: Danton Todorov

customer_reviews.title: The French pointed arms on the keys are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Says it is easier to play than her original rental flute. The French pointed arms on the keys are a nice touch.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: It arrived 2 days after ordering my daughter was supper excited! Sounds great came with 2 nice cases a hard one and soft one also came with a cleaning kit! She loves it so that’s really all that matters!

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for students
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most recommended traversal flute for students. I started my classes in September, I could not wait more to have my own flute. It's amazing! One of my dreams coming true. 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great Student Flute
customer_reviews.text: Bought the flute for my daughter, who is a beginner and she loves it. It came with a soft carrying case and hard case that fits into the carrying case. You can't go wrong with Yamaha.

customer_reviews.title: Just PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Words from my 12 year old :: It’s a fantastic product. Excellent sound quality. Head joint is perfect. All the keynotes are lovely and they are tuned right. .... he loves it. Worth every penny!!!! Thank you for the personal note as well. Beautiful touch !!!!

customer_reviews.title: NOTES FAILURE
customer_reviews.text: Notes are not sounding well. Not happy. I payed a lot of money for the instrument and above that all the taxes... Unbelievable.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for a Yamaha
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Yamaha not a knock-off. Great feel and sound. Like it better than the $525 Conn-Selmer Spirit flute that was endorsed by Sir James Galway.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flute
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Sounds better then some models that cost more. Would recommend......

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: This Yamaha flute is not an American version. That's why it has a huge advantage of half the price compared to the USA version. The package delivered well without any damage. It works perfectly and sounds beautiful. Thank you for super fast shipping !!! 건행 :)

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have had this flute for a year now and it sounds beautiful. I used it for marching band and regular symphonic. The high notes come out nice as well as the low notes below the bar.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner student
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is really fast, from Korea to US just 3 days including weekend. My son love it. I come in Yamaha original box with case and box, Manual and clean clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flute. Bought it to replace an older instrument
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flute. Bought it to replace an older instrument. Soon after, she was receiving Flute 1 parts!

customer_reviews.text: excellent upgrade. Came in 3 days -- shipping was terrific

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker then expected. Everything looks perfect! Happy and buy again

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The product has worked great for my daughter's symphonic band class and will transition with her to High school band!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her Birthday and she loves it. The sound quality is amazing. I love listening to her play.

customer_reviews.title: Untrained ear heard the difference
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never played the flute. I could hear the difference in this compared to my daughters rental.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flute is a replacement for a beginner-my daughter LOVES it. Yamaha quality.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice flute for a young beginner. Sounds great. Well made. Case is well thought out.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: A nice product. A good price. An excellent first flute from what I can tell.

customer_reviews.text: The Yamaha YFL-222 arrived in a timely manner & was in excellent condition!! Perfect for my middle schooler learning to play the flute!

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and plays well
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good flute to continue learning how to play and pick up on the skill. This flute, since I am not a professional, meets the qualifications and suites my needs.

customer_reviews.title: ... but my daughter's teacher said it is a very good and nicely designed instrument
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert but my daughter's teacher said it is a very good and nicely designed instrument.

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter, it is value for money compared to other options that I found, including the lease.

customer_reviews.title: it's not in proper condition. The notes sound bad
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the instrument. My teacher asked me to give up this and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Maia Xu

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a lemon. Will have it checked out.
customer_reviews.text: so far there is a problem. Lightening fast delivery. attractive product. I have never not been able to play a flute. Totally unable to play lower register and many upper register notes. Tone is embarrassingly terrible. Will take to another flute player tomorrow to evaluate. Possibly a lemon and need return. So sorry. Update: I took it to a flute teacher and two of the keys are not closing. Plan to return. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I purchase two of these flutes. Right after 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these flutes. Right after 30 days some of the screws loosen and the flutes were out of tune. The seller refused to accept returns. I contacted the Yamaha support manager. He told me that the seller is in the U.S. , therefore there is no warranty coverage for my flutes. I ended up to take the flutes to the local music instrument repair shop to fix the problem. DON'T BUY from any seller outside the US if you need to warranty.
customer_reviews.author: healthnuts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daugter and her teacher love this flute. Very reliable for begginers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rubber Duck

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument. The quality of Yamaha flutes are wonderful . Comes with a hard case that goes in a carrying case, and also comes with a cleaning kit. I was impressed as was my daughter's band instructor.
customer_reviews.author: NMS523

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's Yamaha you 222
customer_reviews.text: Very good starter flute. I could assess the quality upon hearing the lower bass notes. Solid in construction as well as appearance. My daughter likes it very much and compared to last years one the sound has a fuller and richer tone. A great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bharath S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent flute! It is a birthday gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent flute! It is a birthday gift for my father. My father love it.

customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. Came with flute cleaning kit. Very nice sound.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Hear no complain from him
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for his band practice. So far so good. Hear no complain from him.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My High School Student
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to replace the adequate used flute we'd bought for him in middle school. It looks and sounds great, and he's very happy with how it plays in the concerts he performs in.

customer_reviews.title: A great flute
customer_reviews.text: This is my third flute and also the best. I like the craftsmanship as well as the quality of the sound.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: According to my daughter, flute sounds very good and is easy to play. Compared to similar Geimenhardt and am very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.text: When you don't know enough of the flute market, to trust in yamaha brand will never dissapoint yourself. Excellent quality and playability!
customer_reviews.author: gv

product_meta.title: Yamaha YFL-222 Intermediate Flute for Student (International Version)
product_meta.description: YFL-222 Standard Flute Offset G C-Foot. The Yamaha YFL-222 Standard flute in C features drawn and curled tone holes, covered keys and an offset G. It has a nickel silver headjoint, body and footjoint and a silver-plated finish. I features a C-footjoint and pointed key arms, and comes with a Yamaha standard plastic flute case, polishing cloth, polishing gauze, cleaning rod and Flute Owner’s Manual. CY Headjoint Featuring a double flare taper and a unique embouchure hole undercut design for excellent response and a warm rich tone, the CY headjoint helps beginners quickly learn to produce a beautiful sound. More advanced players will appreciate its even, quick response in all registers. Keys All key shapes and placement have been ergonomically designed for a comfortable, natural-feeling performance. Manufacturing processes have been redesigned from the ground up to achieve substantially improved precision that not only leads to greater mechanical accuracy, but also minimizes the need for readjustment over time. Pointed Key Arms A#, F# and other non-fingered keys feature pointed key arms. This beautiful key design is inspired by traditional European style. Adjustment Screws Yamaha's unique screw resistance inserts allow smooth adjustments while preventing gradual loosing of the screws. For easier access, the screw positioning has been changed. Alignment Marks Footjoint alignment marks facilitate proper fitting by young players.
feature_bullets: Footjoint marking, A unique footjoint alignment mark facilitates proper fitting by young players
Neoprene key bumpers, Stronger and more durable than cork
Nickel-silver, power-forged keys, Very durable and less susceptible to breakage. Closed-hole (Plateau) keys facilitate ease of playability for beginners
1 year seller warranty. Please contact the seller directly for warranty information for this product.
Specifically designed for a clean attack, sensitive response, and accurate intonation
